channel.title: Computer Architecture on Never stop learning!
channel.description: Recent content in Computer Architecture on Never stop learning!

item.title: Microprocess Evolution Paper Summary
item.description: Requirements, Bottlenecks, and Good Fortune: Agents for Microprocessor Evolution buzzword evolution new requirements bottlenecks good fortune a science of tradeoffs the tradeoff between high performance and low costs the tradeoff between high performance and power awareness pipelines in-chip cache branch prediction Specialized Functional Units out of order processing clusters chip multiprocessors(CMP) simultaneous multithreading(SMT) asynchronous and synchronous units coexisting summary This paper introduces the evolution of the microprocessor from 1971 to 2001 and give the opinion about the result of evolution.
